MESSAGE.JP: 敵が配置されていただけか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So there were only enemies in this room...
MESSAGE.Translation: So there were only enemies in this room...

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり同じ場所じゃないのね…。
MESSAGE.EN: So it was not supposed to be in the same room, huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: So it was not supposed to be in the same room, huh?

MESSAGE.JP: ひゅん、と風を切る音が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the sound of something cutting through the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the sound of something cutting through the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 直後には、あたしの上半身だけがスライドして宙に浮いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: A second later, my upper body slid off and hung in the air for a second.
MESSAGE.Translation: A second later, my upper body slid off and hung in the air for a second.

MESSAGE.JP: 本物か…。
MESSAGE.EN: Was this for real...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was this for real...?

MESSAGE.JP: あたしはハンガーを飛ばしていただけだったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had only just started...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had only just started...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと待ってよ。ここってトラップの部屋じゃなかっ…
MESSAGE.EN: Hold on. Wasn't this the trap ro-...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hold on. Wasn't this the trap ro-...

MESSAGE.JP: ずばしゅーーーー!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Slaaaaash!!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slaaaaash!!*

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけのあほよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was so stupid...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was so stupid...

MESSAGE.JP: 鎌になんて負けるか！
MESSAGE.EN: Like scythes could do me in!
MESSAGE.Translation: Like scythes could do me in!

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「おら、こいやーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Come on, bring it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Come on, bring it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずばしゅーーーー!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Slaaaaash!!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slaaaaash!!*

MESSAGE.JP: あたしたちを待ちかまえるように、部屋の奥に石像が座り込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a stone statue sitting in the room waiting for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a stone statue sitting in the room waiting for us.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「石像ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝A statue, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝A statue, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「石像!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝A statue!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝A statue!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 入り口からこんなすぐに仕掛けが!?
MESSAGE.EN: There was something like that this close to the entrance?
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something like that this close to the entrance?

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿にしてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was being underestimated...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was being underestimated...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それがどうしてこんなところに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それは先に行かせないためにでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's probably here to stop us from advancing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's probably here to stop us from advancing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『あたし版』の時にはなかった足がある。
MESSAGE.EN: It had legs unlike ❛my version.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It had legs unlike ❛my version.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今、動いた！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It moved!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It moved!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 巨像が左右に揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The giant statue shook from side to side.
MESSAGE.Translation: The giant statue shook from side to side.

MESSAGE.JP: その片足がぐぐと持ち上がり、ずぅん、と音を立てて、第一歩を踏み出した。
MESSAGE.EN: It made a groaning sound as it lifted one leg and took a step.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made a groaning sound as it lifted one leg and took a step.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「動くんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's moving...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's moving...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「力業じゃだめなのかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I don't think we can just force our way through...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I don't think we can just force our way through...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何かの方法で、こいつと戦うことになるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How were we supposed to fight this thing?
MESSAGE.Translation: How were we supposed to fight this thing?

MESSAGE.JP: 叩いてかぶってじゃんけんぽん、なんて馬鹿らしい方法じゃなく。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't like we could play a silly game like hit-and-cover rock-paper-scissors with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't like we could play a silly game like hit-and-cover rock-paper-scissors with it.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎしっ、と何かがしなる音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a sound of something bending under pressure.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a sound of something bending under pressure.

MESSAGE.JP: 壁か？
MESSAGE.EN: The wall?
MESSAGE.Translation: The wall?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今、動いた！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It moved!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It moved!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 視線を巨像に戻すと、それが左右に揺れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I looked back to the statue, it was shaking from side to side.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I looked back to the statue, it was shaking from side to side.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「まさか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その片足がぐぐと持ち上がり、ずぅん、と音を立てて、第一歩を踏み出した。
MESSAGE.EN: It made a groaning sound as it lifted one leg and took a step.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made a groaning sound as it lifted one leg and took a step.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「動くんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's moving...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's moving...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あはは…力対力、直接対決ってわけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ahaha... a straight-up battle of strength, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ahaha... a straight-up battle of strength, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。剣だ。剣を探せ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Right. A sword. I looked around for a sword...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right. A sword. I looked around for a sword...

MESSAGE.JP: どこにある？
MESSAGE.EN: Where would one be?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where would one be?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんはどこから拾い上げたんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Where did Riki-kun find it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did Riki-kun find it?

MESSAGE.JP: 今の理樹くんに訊いても意味ないし…。
MESSAGE.EN: It would be pointless to ask him now...
MESSAGE.Translation: It would be pointless to ask him now...

MESSAGE.JP: おっと、よそ見している場合じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Crap, this wasn't the time to be looking around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap, this wasn't the time to be looking around.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら剣は、理樹くんしか見つけられないようになっているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe Riki-kun was the only one who could find the sword.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe Riki-kun was the only one who could find the sword.

MESSAGE.JP: …なら、それまで時間稼ぎだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If so, I needed to buy him time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If so, I needed to buy him time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれと戦うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're going to fight it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're going to fight it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうみたいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Looks that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Looks that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんな石の塊に何が効くっていうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you have something that would be effective against a block of stone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you have something that would be effective against a block of stone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずぅん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「とりあえず銃弾は効きそうもないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, it looks like bullets won't work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, it looks like bullets won't work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずぅん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ、こっち向いた！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah, it's coming this way!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah, it's coming this way!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずぅん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Thud*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Thud*.

MESSAGE.JP: 石像はあたしを目指して歩いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The statue advanced toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The statue advanced toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くんは、回り込んで、常にあたしとは点対称の位置で待避してて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, go around it and hide directly opposite me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, go around it and hide directly opposite me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「沙耶さんは!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あたしが戦わなくて、誰が戦うのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If I don't fight, who will...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If I don't fight, who will...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「べつにふたりでもっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can fight together!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can fight together!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「邪魔なだけよ、どいてて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You're just a hindrance. Get out of the way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You're just a hindrance. Get out of the way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな、ひとりじゃ危険すぎるよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it's too dangerous to fight it alone!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it's too dangerous to fight it alone!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「素人でもなし、簡単にやられるかっての」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm not an amateur. I won't go down that easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm not an amateur. I won't go down that easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 高く掲げられた腕。
MESSAGE.EN: It raised its arm high.
MESSAGE.Translation: It raised its arm high.

MESSAGE.JP: それが振り下ろされる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then brought it crashing down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then brought it crashing down.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶぅん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: 横っ飛びに避けるも、床に打ちつけられたその震動で転がされてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I dodged to the side, but the shockwave from it slamming the floor knocked me over.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dodged to the side, but the shockwave from it slamming the floor knocked me over.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「沙耶さん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「黙ってなさいってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I told you to shut up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I told you to shut up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 銃を構え、額めがけて、何発か撃ち込んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed my gun, aimed at its forehead, and fired a number of rounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed my gun, aimed at its forehead, and fired a number of rounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 表面を少しばかり削ることしか叶わない。
MESSAGE.EN: It did little more than scratch it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It did little more than scratch it.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶぅん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: すぐこっちに向けて手を振り下ろしてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: It immediately turned toward me and brought its hand down.
MESSAGE.Translation: It immediately turned toward me and brought its hand down.

MESSAGE.JP: こうなったら、懐に飛び込むのみ！
MESSAGE.EN: With this, my only choice would be to jump straight at him!
MESSAGE.Translation: With this, my only choice would be to jump straight at him!

MESSAGE.JP: ずどどどどど！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam*bam*bam*bam*bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam*bam*bam*bam*bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: それは拳を削るだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It only scratched his fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: It only scratched his fist.

MESSAGE.JP: 間に合わない…
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't going to make it in time...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't going to make it in time...

MESSAGE.JP: ぶちゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Squish.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Squish.*

MESSAGE.JP: 圧死。
MESSAGE.EN: I was crushed to death.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was crushed to death.

MESSAGE.JP: 飛び退くが…
MESSAGE.EN: I jump back, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I jump back, but...

MESSAGE.JP: ぶぅん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: それは床に叩きつけられた後、あたしを横薙ぎにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After hitting the floor, it swept sideways toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After hitting the floor, it swept sideways toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 身を屈めて、石像の懐へ潜り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I ducked and dove toward its chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ducked and dove toward its chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 続けざま腕の関節に向けて、銃を撃った。
MESSAGE.EN: Without delay, I turned toward the joint of the arm and fired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without delay, I turned toward the joint of the arm and fired.

MESSAGE.JP: ばしゅ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang!*

MESSAGE.JP: これまでと同じようにその表面をわずかに削るだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Same as before, it merely scratched the surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: Same as before, it merely scratched the surface.

MESSAGE.JP: くそ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Shit...
MESSAGE.Translation: Shit...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「沙耶さん、僕がやるよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya-san, I'll get him!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya-san, I'll get him!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんの声。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Riki-kun's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Riki-kun's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿を探すと、石像の後ろで彼は剣を構えて立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I swept the room for him and saw him standing behind the statue wielding a sword.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swept the room for him and saw him standing behind the statue wielding a sword.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「その剣どうしたの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Where'd you find that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Where'd you find that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「置いてあったんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was just lying there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was just lying there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なら、それで戦うのが正解なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, fighting with that was the right choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, fighting with that was the right choice.

MESSAGE.JP: よし。
MESSAGE.EN: Alright.
MESSAGE.Translation: Alright.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「貸して！　ってうわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Let me borrow it! Woah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Let me borrow it! Woah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 石像の体当たりを喰らうところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to get a face full of statue.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to get a face full of statue.

MESSAGE.JP: 脇に逃げ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I escaped around its flank.
MESSAGE.Translation: I escaped around its flank.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くん、剣を渡しなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, give me the sword!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, give me the sword!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、沙耶さんは逃げて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you run!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you run!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「逃げるのは、あんたよ！　とっとと剣を渡しなさい、馬鹿！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You're the one who should be running! Now give me the sword, you idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You're the one who should be running! Now give me the sword, you idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「危ない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Watch out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Watch out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぶぅん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: しゃがんだすぐ頭上を石の腕が通り過ぎていった。
MESSAGE.EN: I crouched, and a stone arm immediately passed overhead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I crouched, and a stone arm immediately passed overhead.

MESSAGE.JP: くそ、剣は後回しだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Shit, the sword will have to wait.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shit, the sword will have to wait.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「剣を渡しなさい！　これで渡さなかったら、あんたを倒してでも奪い取るから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Give me the sword! If you don't, I'll knock you out and take it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Give me the sword! If you don't, I'll knock you out and take it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、投げるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'm gonna throw it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'm gonna throw it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 脅しが通じた。
MESSAGE.EN: My threat worked.
MESSAGE.Translation: My threat worked.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いくよ…はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here I go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here I go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: かきぃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang!*

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くんの投げたそれは、石像の手で阻まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The statue's hand intercepted the sword that Riki-kun threw.
MESSAGE.Translation: The statue's hand intercepted the sword that Riki-kun threw.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対にあれが必要なんだ。こいつを倒すには。
MESSAGE.EN: I definitely needed that to defeat this guy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I definitely needed that to defeat this guy.

MESSAGE.JP: また死ぬかもしれないけど、いけ！
MESSAGE.EN: I might die again, but I was going to go for it!
MESSAGE.Translation: I might die again, but I was going to go for it!

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは強引に巨像の脇をくぐろうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to duck and squeeze myself under the statue's arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to duck and squeeze myself under the statue's arm.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶちゅ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Squish.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Squish.*

MESSAGE.JP: 考えてもみろ、銃でダメージも与えられない敵に、剣が一体なんの役に立つ？
MESSAGE.EN: If you think about it, what good would a sword do against an opponent that guns don't work on?
MESSAGE.Translation: If you think about it, what good would a sword do against an opponent that guns don't work on?

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは銃を口にくわえて、その巨体の胴にしがみついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the gun in my mouth and clung to the statue's body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the gun in my mouth and clung to the statue's body.

MESSAGE.JP: フリークライミングの要領で、上っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I climbed up using the basics of free climbing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I climbed up using the basics of free climbing.

MESSAGE.JP: 肩まで辿りつくと、それを払いのけようと腕が伸びてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I reached the shoulders, it stretched out its arms to try and knock me off.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I reached the shoulders, it stretched out its arms to try and knock me off.

MESSAGE.JP: それを避けるために、今度は頭の上へ。
MESSAGE.EN: In order to dodge, I climbed to the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: In order to dodge, I climbed to the head.

MESSAGE.JP: そこであたしは、ようやくこの敵の倒し方を知った。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon arrival, I finally figured out how to defeat this opponent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon arrival, I finally figured out how to defeat this opponent.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くん、剣を投げて！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, throw me the sword!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Riki-kun, throw me the sword!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなっ…きみに当たるって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... I might hit you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... I might hit you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「いいから投げなさい！　いい加減怒るわよ!!　この、うすのろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Whatever, just throw it! I mean, give me a break! You damn simpleton!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Whatever, just throw it! I mean, give me a break! You damn simpleton!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ…うすのろ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... simpleton?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... simpleton?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 躊躇した後、どうにでもなれというように、その手の剣をあたしに向けて投擲した。
MESSAGE.EN: He hesitated, but eventually threw it toward me like he didn't care anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: He hesitated, but eventually threw it toward me like he didn't care anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱしっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Grab!*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grab!*

MESSAGE.JP: その柄をしっかりと宙でつかみ取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught the sword in midair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught the sword in midair.

MESSAGE.JP: 石像はいやいやをするように頭を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: The statue violently shook its head as if it were adamantly denying something.
MESSAGE.Translation: The statue violently shook its head as if it were adamantly denying something.

MESSAGE.JP: あたしは振り落とされないよう、片手で必死に食らいつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately held on with one hand so I wouldn't fall off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately held on with one hand so I wouldn't fall off.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく揺れが収まると、剣を両手に持ち直し、真下、石像の頭の『スリット』に突き刺した。
MESSAGE.EN: The shaking finally subsided, so I grabbed the sword with both hands and thrust straight down into the ❛slit❜ on the statue's head.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shaking finally subsided, so I grabbed the sword with both hands and thrust straight down into the ❛slit❜ on the statue's head.

MESSAGE.JP: なんの抵抗もなく刃は奥深く刺さる。
MESSAGE.EN: It slid in deep with no resistance.
MESSAGE.Translation: It slid in deep with no resistance.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後にもうひと押し。えい、と力をこめると、確かな手応え。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave one last push. I put all my power into it and it definitely triggered something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave one last push. I put all my power into it and it definitely triggered something.

MESSAGE.JP: がちり。
MESSAGE.EN: I held firm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held firm.

MESSAGE.JP: 石像は電池が切れたおもちゃのように、動かなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The statue stopped moving, like a toy whose battery had run dry.
MESSAGE.Translation: The statue stopped moving, like a toy whose battery had run dry.

MESSAGE.JP: 直後、ごとり、と仕掛けが解けた音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: A second later, I heard the sound of the lock opening.
MESSAGE.Translation: A second later, I heard the sound of the lock opening.

MESSAGE.JP: …やった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We did it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We did it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すごいよ…沙耶さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya-san... you're amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya-san... you're amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ちなみに怪力でぶっ刺したわけじゃないからね。剣をスリットに差し込んだだけだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝It's not like I stabbed him through sheer strength alone. I put the sword in a slit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝It's not like I stabbed him through sheer strength alone. I put the sword in a slit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでもすごく…スポーツとかでもそうだけど、戦ってる女性って美しいよね。なんかすごくかっこよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, but it's still amazing... sports is one thing, but seeing a girl fight is beautiful. You were cool and amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, but it's still amazing... sports is one thing, but seeing a girl fight is beautiful. You were cool and amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ええ!?　今のでポイントアップ!?
MESSAGE.EN: What?! Did I just earn points with him?!
MESSAGE.Translation: What?! Did I just earn points with him?!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くん、あなた女を見る目ないんじゃない？
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun, what's with your taste in women?
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun, what's with your taste in women?

MESSAGE.JP: しかも、うすのろ、とか言っちゃったし…。
MESSAGE.EN: I even called you a simpleton...
MESSAGE.Translation: I even called you a simpleton...

MESSAGE.JP: それとも、やっぱり『記憶』が…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe he still had his ❛memories❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe he still had his ❛memories❜...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹くん…
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun...

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで居たこと、覚えてる…？
MESSAGE.EN: Do you remember when we were together...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do you remember when we were together...?

MESSAGE.JP: なんてロマンチックに浸るあたしは石像の頭上。
MESSAGE.EN: I was still on the statue's head wallowing in romanticism.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was still on the statue's head wallowing in romanticism.

MESSAGE.JP: 床に飛び降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: I dropped to the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dropped to the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃあ、ネクストフロアー行くわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay, let's go to the next floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay, let's go to the next floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
